title: Evandro Silva Resende
text:
Evandro Silva Resende (or simply Evandro, born May 10, 1986 in <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a>) is a Brazilian <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="Striker%20%28association%20football%29">striker</a> who currently plays for <a href="Associa%C3%A7%C3%A3o%20Atl%C3%A9tica%20Francana">Francana</a>.
Club career.
He joined <a href="Saipa%20F.C.">Saipa</a> in 2007. In 2008, he returned to <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a> and signed for <a href="Rio%20Branco%20Atl%C3%A9tico%20Clube">Rio Branco Atlético Clube</a>. He currently plays for <a href="Americano%20Futebol%20Clube">Americano Futebol Clube</a>.
